Entries.summer_10: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering at the beach for the annual Pelican Town Beachside Potluck.^^The highlight of the event is the communal soup. Make sure you bring something good to contribute!^The governor himself is attending the event, so make sure you're on your best behavior.^Come to the beach sometime between 9 AM and 2 PM.^   -Mayor Lewis[#]Luau Notice

Entries.governorReaction5: emote Governor 40/pause 400/speak Governor "Hmmm... Well it's not bad, but it's missing something...$s#$b#Did everyone in town contribute an ingredient to the soup? I feel like it's missing someone's unique voice."/showFrame Governor 0/pause 400/showFrame Lewis 18/emote Lewis 28/pause 600/showFrame Lewis 0/pause 400/move Lewis 2 0 2/move Lewis 0 2 3/pause 500/animate Lewis false false 200 19 19 22 23 23 22 23 23 22 19 19/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 600/playSound gulp/pause 1000/speak Lewis "You're right... Sorry the soup wasn't anything special."/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 2/speak Lewis "Now... who else wants some soup?"/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/advancedMove Gus false 0 -1 5 0 4 1000/advancedMove Jodi false 0 -2/advancedMove Clint false 0 1 -1 0 0 3 -2 0/advancedMove Emily false 3 0/advancedMove Pam false 0 2 7 0/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 300/message "The soup was bland, but the potluck was still fun!"/pause 500/message "Time to head home."/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
